data.news_body: The trading window of the Company shall remain closed from Thursday 01st January 2026 up to 48 hours after the declaration of the unaudited Financial Result of the Company for the Quarter ended 31st December 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Jaro Institute of Technology Management and Research Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 30 2025 the equity shares of Jaro Institute of Technology Management and Research Ltd (Scrip Code: 544534) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250929-  dated September 29 2025.
